extendedInfo.description: PUBLIC BETA IS NOW OPEN!Patient Zero is a virtual pandemic simulator where you get to infect real players. Infections get transferred by players coming within proximity of each other in the real world. Players infected with your virus will carry it and infect more players. See how quickly your unique virus spreads! FEATURES:Three different virus types, each with unique properties.Leaderboard showing the most infectious strain.Live map view to aid in spreading your infection.Global infection map - See how far your virus has spread!Carrier status information - See what you're infected with.Text to speech enabled devices will even say player names as you infect them.NOTE: Other players will not be able to get your exact location, only a general idea. GPS and network location are supported.Finally, showing up to work with a nasty infection will no longer be frowned upon! The more players you infect, the greater chance your virus will become an unstoppable pandemic. Infect someone at the airport before they board a plane and the real fun starts! Try actively spreading your infection while you commute to work!Remember, this is a beta and not the finished product. There will be issues and I'm working as fast as I can to resolve them. Thanks for your patience! Email me with questions and feedback.New features the community demands are actively being developed!

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Awesome game! Its a great and innovative idea, i havent seen anything like it. Really fun when taking trips into the city!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but no one near by...
reviews.comment: It looks fun but there isn\'t any one within 27 miles of me so not much I can do
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very interesting, original app!
reviews.comment: This is the most innovating game I have ever seen so far, creating a unique and addicting experience. For such a great game, its surprising that it didnt receive much attention. Good job! =)
reviews.author: brian tan

reviews.title: Great! But needs more people....
reviews.comment: This is a really awesome concept, and when I first downloaded it was pretty exciting to infect the first 20 or so people, but since then it seems everyone playing is carrying the max infections. It\'s hard to get a hold anywhere. More people or more carrying slots would make this awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow.
reviews.comment: Wow. This is a really intresting concept, I am really looking forward to new updates for this game. I really hope it catches on and more people start to play it. Well done (:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome concept
reviews.comment: Fantastic idea for a game. I really wish more people near me played! I travel a bit though, so it\'ll be fun to watch it play out
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I\'m loving the game but I think more viruses and greater radiuses are needed. I would also like the infection map to map expired infections as well active ones. But overall excellent game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This \"Game\" will go \"Viral\"
reviews.comment: This is really cool and I expect to get even better as it gets more developed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A masterpiece in progress.
reviews.comment: The concept behind this game is innovative, and one of a kind. I can\'t wait too see what this will turn into.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Great game but could be better with more types of viruses, if you were able to kill other players, and if you could let the game run in the background so you don\'t have to have the game open to be playing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
reviews.comment: I can\'t think of one person who wouldn\'t love this app. Recommendation to dev... keep free with 3 basic diseases then use in-app billing to add more. You definitely deserve to be paid on this beauty.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game. Going to get even better
reviews.comment: This is a neat concept. It is going to be very cool once developer adds even more ideas that he has. This is not time consuming. It is great for those that like to game, but don\'t have hours to play. I can\'t wait to have a business trip or vacation just to spread my virus . LOL  I actually drove my car 1 mile past my destination today just because I was only a mile from infecting someone. That\'s how addictive it can get.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bugs to work out
reviews.comment: I know this is still in beta but every time I go on the infection map the app force closes. Also its not clear how you actually infect people, a quick \'how to\' would help. Brilliant for people who travel a lot
reviews.author: John Parker

reviews.title: More active people required.
reviews.comment: Needs people still. This game needs something to get people who are remote from others to keep logging in. Like a side game where you could nominate a vaccine or drop in location  based upon your ability to avoid catching something and numbers of times you do connect in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: This game is really fun and I finally made it on to the leader board this week! I just wish there was a way to report people who are obviously cheating. I hate seeing people who get 100 infections in 1 hour and yet they only have 3 active locations! Overall great app you should definitely give it a try
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool Idea
reviews.comment: You should add a \"share\" option for facebook to get more people involved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Highly contagious game!
reviews.comment: Love this game. Simple idea but completely addictive. Just thinking about jumping in the car and having a drive to manchester to infect a few more. I must be mad! Just needs a few more players. It\'ll get there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: The interface is a little edgy but the concept is fantastic.  Takes no time to play either.  I can\'t wait to go in trips now so I can spread my disease.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: I love this game and can only echo what many others have said - more players and more slots please! I\'ve been playing for a few months now and have definitely seen an increase in numbers since I started, I hope it continues!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad at all
reviews.comment: I enjoy it. Wish I could rename my virus or even see the name. I forgot what I called it.
reviews.author: A Google User
